description:
The hit Netflix series Squid Game has finally returned for its long-awaited second season. However, the series has been met with some backlash. In this particular case, some Netflix viewers are calling out a controversial casting choice made for the new season of Squid Game. The new season revolves around an all-new game which means [...]

The post Netflix Viewers Call Out ‘Squid Game’ For Controversial Casting Choice appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Netflix Viewers Call Out ‘Squid Game’ For Controversial Casting Choice
